name: test_complete_purchase_flow
description:
### 🎯 Test Objective
Validates the complete end-to-end purchase workflow from user authentication through order completion,
ensuring all critical business processes function correctly in an integrated environment.

### 📋 Test Scope
1. **Authentication** - User login with valid credentials and URL validation
2. **Product Selection** - Add 2 items to shopping cart with count verification
3. **Cart Management** - Navigate to cart and initiate checkout process
4. **Checkout Process** - Complete customer information form (name, postal code)
5. **Order Finalization** - Review and confirm purchase completion

### 💼 Business Value
- Ensures critical revenue-generating workflow operates without failures
- Validates integration between authentication, inventory, and checkout systems
- Provides confidence for production deployment readiness
- Covers primary user journey representing core business functionality

### ✅ Success Criteria
- Successful authentication with URL transition to inventory page
- Cart badge displays accurate count of 2 products
- Seamless navigation through all checkout steps
- Order completion page reached and validated

### 🔧 Technical Implementation
- **Framework**: Pytest + Selenium WebDriver
- **Design Pattern**: Page Object Model (POM)
- **Reporting**: Allure Framework with automated screenshot capture
- **Validations**: URL assertions, element state verification, cart count validation

🎯 Test Objective

Validates the complete end-to-end purchase workflow from user authentication through order completion,
ensuring all critical business processes function correctly in an integrated environment.

📋 Test Scope

  1. Authentication - User login with valid credentials and URL validation
  2. Product Selection - Add 2 items to shopping cart with count verification
  3. Cart Management - Navigate to cart and initiate checkout process
  4. Checkout Process - Complete customer information form (name, postal code)
  5. Order Finalization - Review and confirm purchase completion

💼 Business Value

  • Ensures critical revenue-generating workflow operates without failures
  • Validates integration between authentication, inventory, and checkout systems
  • Provides confidence for production deployment readiness
  • Covers primary user journey representing core business functionality

✅ Success Criteria

  • Successful authentication with URL transition to inventory page
  • Cart badge displays accurate count of 2 products
  • Seamless navigation through all checkout steps
  • Order completion page reached and validated

🔧 Technical Implementation

  • Framework: Pytest + Selenium WebDriver
  • Design Pattern: Page Object Model (POM)
  • Reporting: Allure Framework with automated screenshot capture
  • Validations: URL assertions, element state verification, cart count validation
